column3: Godafre appears in need of some tight-lipped assistance.
Deliver the unheavy package to Godafre.

Godsdammit...
This'll all fall through without the goods, but how am I supposed to get there and back without─
Bloody hells, where did you spring from!? Bah, never mind that─can you keep your mouth shut, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>?
I've a package hidden away over in Specula Imperatoris, and I need someone discreet to go and fetch it for me.

Don't let its size dissuade you─the thing's as light as air. I'd head over there myself, you know, but if folk were to spot me it would cause <Emphasis>complications</Emphasis> for future dealings. Well, go on! There's a reward in it for you!
The package is in a secluded corner of Specula Imperatoris. Try to slip in and out with no one the wiser if you can manage it, eh?
Well? Did you bring the goods?
Aye, that's the stuff! You've done this sort of thing before, eh?

I see what you're thinking: “What's in this big package that weighs next to naught?” Well, I'd better satisfy your curiosity before you start asking questions to the wrong people. It's tobacco, my friend─made right here in Radiata.

I used to be a porter for the imperials, you see, carting supplies around all day until my back was screaming. The officers would complain about their military-issue pipeweed, so I started earning myself a few small luxuries by smuggling in Radiata's best. On the quiet, of course.
And I'd appreciate it if you could keep quiet, too. I mean to sell to the Resistance forces next, and they'd best not know about my previous customers.
Here's the reward I promised you. Half for the job, and half to keep your lips sealed, understand?
